name: Color Spec-Trum
description:
Player controls a white speck  through a series of multicolored mazes. By changing the color of the environment, the player can phase through walls or enemies.

This game is mostly a way for me to practice programming and level design. I had no help in making anything in this game. If anyone would have some feedback or ideas for anything to implement into the game, or ways to further improve, I will be keeping an eye on the comments.
